GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
vhost/vsock: Use kvmalloc/kvfree for larger packets.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit e6d0152c95108651f1880c1ddfab47cb9e3e62d0, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 433fc58e6bf2c8bd97e57153ed28e64fd78207b8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: vhost/vsock: Use kvmalloc/kvfree for larger packets.
